title: Is blogging still effective in 2021?
content: According to a report from Demand Metric, 90% of businesses still use content marketing. 92% of content marketers rely on blogging as their primary form of content.

title: How do I start blogging?
content: The first step for creating a blog is to decide where to host it. If you plan on creating a business blog, you can use your existing domain and website. You may even be able to use the same platform used to build your business site.

title: What are the characteristics of a successful blog?
content: You donâ€™t need to be a professional writer to write an engaging, helpful blog post. You just need to take the time to research, write and edit your content.

title: What are the most popular types of blog posts?
content: Most blogs feature a variety of formats, as some types of posts may work better with certain types of content. A few of the most common types of blog posts include: Listicles, How-to articles, Reviews and Pillar pages.

title: How often should I post new content??
content: According to the experts, most small businesses publish new blog posts one to four times per week.
